name: The weak Hero
description:
The weak Hero

This game was made for GMTK game jam 2019 (theme: only one) with pico 8.

It is a very short gam. You play as a hero who needs to find the gamepad of the best gamer in the world and return it to his castel. But you can only carry one item at a time.

Controlls: Arrowkeys (or dpad) to move, X (or V or M or (B)) to pickup or drop items, Z (or C or N or (A)) to use items.
